column3: News;Phnom Penh: A foreigner died on October 28
column8: Khan Daun Penh. The man has been named as  John David Ray Fredrick Peter Koyczan
column10: was found in bed at the scene of the incident.  According to a forensic examination the cause of death was a heart attack.------The victim’s belongings were handed over to the Bureau of Investigation and proceeded and the body transferred to the Stung Meanchey pagoda.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/268870
